snippet: The main Athens stock index fell 5.2 percent as the government's showdown with its European partners appeared to be nearing a decisive stage.

byline.contributor: Niki Kitsantonis contributed reporting from Athens.

lead_paragraph: The main Athens stock index fell 5.2 percent as the government's showdown with its European partners appeared to be nearing a decisive stage.

headline.main: Greek Markets Stumble After Face-Off With Bailout Lenders
